detectors.description: LuckyDoubler.rand(uint256) (bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU1.sol#75-80) uses a weak PRNG: "uint256((uint256(hashVal) / factor)) % max (bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU1.sol#79)"

LuckyDoubler.changeOwner(address) (bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU1.sol#81-83) should emit an event for: 
	- owner = newOwner (bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU1.sol#82)

LuckyDoubler.changeMultiplier(uint256) (bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU1.sol#84-88) should emit an event for: 
	- multiplier = multi (bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU1.sol#87)

LuckyDoubler.changeFee(uint256) (bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU1.sol#89-93) should emit an event for: 
	- fee = newFee (bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU1.sol#92)

LuckyDoubler.changeOwner(address).newOwner (bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU1.sol#81) lacks a zero-check on :
		- owner = newOwner (bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU1.sol#82)
Modifier LuckyDoubler.onlyowner() (bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU1.sol#12-15) does not always execute _; or revert
detectors.markdown: Modifier [LuckyDoubler.onlyowner()](bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU1.sol#L12-L15) does not always execute _; or revert

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in LuckyDoubler.join() (bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU1.sol#38-73):
	External calls:
	- ! msg.sender.send(msg.value - 1000000000000000000) (bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU1.sol#41)
	- ! theEntry.entryAddress.send(payout) (bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU1.sol#58)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balance -= payout (bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU1.sol#62)
	- theEntry.paid = true (bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU1.sol#60)
	- unpaidEntries[index] = unpaidEntries[unpaidEntries.length - 1] (bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU1.sol#64)
	- unpaidEntries.length -- (bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU1.sol#66)
	- users[theEntry.entryAddress].payoutsReceived ++ (bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU1.sol#61)
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [LuckyDoubler.join()](bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU1.sol#L38-L73):
	External calls:
	- [! msg.sender.send(msg.value - 1000000000000000000)](bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU1.sol#L41)
	- [! theEntry.entryAddress.send(payout)](bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU1.sol#L58)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [balance -= payout](bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU1.sol#L62)
	- [theEntry.paid = true](bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU1.sol#L60)
	- [unpaidEntries[index] = unpaidEntries[unpaidEntries.length - 1]](bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU1.sol#L64)
	- [unpaidEntries.length --](bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU1.sol#L66)
	- [users[theEntry.entryAddress].payoutsReceived ++](bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU1.sol#L61)

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in LuckyDoubler.join() (bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU1.sol#38-73):
	External calls:
	- ! msg.sender.send(msg.value - 1000000000000000000) (bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU1.sol#41)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balance += (dValue * (100 - fee)) / 100 (bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU1.sol#53)
	- entries.push(Entry(msg.sender,dValue,(dValue * (multiplier) / 100),false)) (bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU1.sol#50)
	- unpaidEntries.push(entries.length - 1) (bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU1.sol#52)
	- users[msg.sender].id = msg.sender (bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU1.sol#46)
	- users[msg.sender].deposits = 0 (bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU1.sol#47)
	- users[msg.sender].payoutsReceived = 0 (bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU1.sol#48)
	- users[msg.sender].deposits ++ (bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU1.sol#51)
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [LuckyDoubler.join()](bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU1.sol#L38-L73):
	External calls:
	- [! msg.sender.send(msg.value - 1000000000000000000)](bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU1.sol#L41)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [balance += (dValue * (100 - fee)) / 100](bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU1.sol#L53)
	- [entries.push(Entry(msg.sender,dValue,(dValue * (multiplier) / 100),false))](bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU1.sol#L50)
	- [unpaidEntries.push(entries.length - 1)](bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU1.sol#L52)
	- [users[msg.sender].id = msg.sender](bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU1.sol#L46)
	- [users[msg.sender].deposits = 0](bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU1.sol#L47)
	- [users[msg.sender].payoutsReceived = 0](bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU1.sol#L48)
	- [users[msg.sender].deposits ++](bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU1.sol#L51)
